item.title: Howto: Modify block format options dropdown in WordPress (TinyMCE)
item.description: There is an easy way to modify the block format options dropdown in the WordPress editor. Simply add those lines to your theme’s functions.php (wp-content/themes/{name}/functions.php) and modify the list according to your needs: function extend_tiny_mce_defaults ($config) { // comma separated list of any block-level HTML tag $config['theme_advanced_blockformats'] = 'p,h3,h4,pre,address'; return $config; } add_filter('tiny_mce_before_init', 'extend_tiny_mce_defaults', 100);
